overview: Chase Me Charlie was an anthology consisting of excerpts from several of Chaplin's short films made for the Essanay Company, including The Tramp, Shanghaied, In the Park and The Bank.  The 1918 film-- fourteen years later--  was re released, this time with music and narration. The score was written by Elias Breeskin and the narration was spoken by Teddy Bergman who later changed his name to Alan Reed
tagline: It's a Riot! It's the Original!...It Flickers!...It Jumps!...It's Silly
title: Chase Me Charlie
